title: [Self-Directed] Online Safety Training for Sit-Stand Workstation Usage

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of office work environments
context.additional_context: Providing interactive online learning environments using digital devices for professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain correct posture settings for body parts when using sit-stand workstations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can list three or more health risks of prolonged sedentary work and propose prevention strategies.
Learners can establish and implement two or more sit-stand transition strategies tailored to individual work environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
